root: ^The test is to find learn about flowers
^Your mom is going to take you out in nature to review…
^This area is an flowers park where there are different flowers.
^There are tasks with learning about different flowers
^Gardener Ana: "Welcome to the garden! Ready to learn about flowers?"
^"I’m not sure, I’m not a gardener."

act2_retry_introduction: ^Ana: "No worries! I'll guide you through. Want to try again?"
act2_question1: ^Roses are beautiful flowers that come in many colors. They need lots of water to grow big and strong.
